description: Composite numbers n such that number of nonprime d with 0<d<n, GCD(n,d)=1, is pi(n).
comments: Numbers n such that 2*A000720(n) = A000010(n) + A001221(n). - _Max Alekseyev_, Aug 22 2013No other terms below 10^6.
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = {if (isprime(n) , return (0)); nb = 0; for (d=1, n-1, if (! isprime(d) && gcd(n, d) == 1, nb++);); return (nb == primepi(n));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 14 2013
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
